summary: Civil Engineer with over six years of expertise in calculating and managing take-off quantities, as well as drafting variations and payments. As a Quantity Surveyor, I worked on significant projects like Al Saadiyat Island Resort and obtained expertise procuring civil works and interior design materials.

projects.title: Al Saadiyat Island Resort Project
projects.description: Applied technical ability to maintain, update and follow-up of the take-off quantities and approved BOQ at Site. Prepared variation submitted to the consultant and was responsible for the interior design package. Communicated with the Project Director to ensure all calculations are as per project specifications and shop drawings. Assisted the Senior Quantity Surveyor at Site in payments for waste-management.

projects.title: High Rise Building
projects.description: Our Senior Graduation Project at University was a structural design for a High rise Building of 35 Floors we used several Software such as ETABS , STAAD , AutoCad

contributors.headline: Quality Manager | Handover Manager | PMP® | PMI-RMP® | ISO 9001:2015 QMS Lead Auditor

profile_positions.description:
• Worked as a quantity surveyor on building construction projects and preparation of construction project documents.
• Completed various quantity takeoffs and developed estimates for multiple construction projects.
• Read and interpret various types of construction specifications and technical drawings, as well as construction schedules and manuals.
• Audited sub-contractors' bills for compliance with project budget. Also, negotiated agreements/settlements of final accounts with contractors, sub-contractors, and suppliers.
• Respond to quotations and requests for proposals by comparing prices and evaluating technical capabilities, then invite suitable bidders to make bids.
• Review Bill of Quantities, Quantity take-off and actual site quantities as part of const analysis and cost control.
• Prepared quantity take-offs from contract documents and working drawings.
• Produced cost estimates using drawings and contracted unit rates. Derived rates for new items, if any, and prepared cost estimates for those items with supporting documents.
• Cost analysis for modifications as per client requirements.
• Involved in the process of agreement of variation orders and evaluations. Acquired quotations, sourced applicable suppliers, and prepared a cost estimate for any variation orders.
• Reviewed contract documents for completeness.
• Supervised other Quantity Surveyors (QS) and Assistant QS.

Selected Achievements: 
• Managed and prepared all variation submitted to consultants and was responsible for the interior design package of Al Saadiyaat Island Resort Project. Handled all calculations as per specifications and shop drawings.
profile_positions.title: Quantity Surveyor

profile_positions.description:
Strictly followed and implemented all procurement policies and procedures. Reviewed technical specifications, BOQ and drawings for procurement of materials and assign vendor list. Prepared inquiry documents (technical & commercial), as well as effectively communicate with vendors for inquiries and to receive quotations on deadlines. Effectively negotiated with vendors for best prices, payment terms and other commercial conditions. Issued Purchase orders (PO) in accordance with selected vendors, price and technical specifications. Worked on following projects:
•	Emirates National School in Ras Al Khaimah Project.
•	Emirates National School in Mohamed Bin Zayed City Project.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Learn how to Go through and Understand The Structural and Architectural Plans .
* Worked With a Quantity Surveyor and Did the Quantities for a small Villa .
*See how the work at site is done , Such as the Shuttering System , waterproofing , Draining system , how they Distribute the Steel Bars and Casting Concrete and the slump test for the Concrete
profile_positions.title: Trainee
